title: Keller 1903 Excerpt from The Story of My Life

content.question: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Keller makes to convey her message about the world around her and overcoming her personal fears about it.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that analyzes the rhetorical choices Keller makes to convey her message about the world around her and overcoming her personal fears about it.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
